message: I think this is a fair split, Bob. I'm taking the majority since I'm the one proposing first, but I'm still leaving you a decent chunk.
I'm not impressed with your first offer. I'm taking a larger share this time, but I'm still willing to compromise.
Let's split it evenly this time, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise.  We can both walk away with a good amount after inflation hits.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not falling for an even split. I'm taking a bigger share this time.
